item.description:
Hello everyone, Meet at 5:30, then join me for a leisurely self-guided evening tour through The Elms and Marble House; enjoy both houses for the price of one as you enjoy live holiday music and sample light refreshments, eggnog and cider at each Saturday, December 15 only 6pm-9pm Tickets - Adult $28, Child $10 For more information and to purchase tickets (please purchase tickets yourself, I don't want to coordinate that), visit, and look under "Holiday Evening Duet": https://tix.newportmansions.org/ecommerce/itemShow.aspx?Grp=ga5rmYjGIqc=&Name=XVYn4Rr49C1xnkRZQ00iToA7LGsJiAwu And don't worry about coming out alone, everyone is welcome! *) Please RSVP, don't just show up.

We'll meet at Marble House first, see the house, then drive to The Elms and see that one.  Hope to see you all there!  *)

~Erinn
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Marble House Parking Lot under cedar trees in back left of lot (I have red Mini Cooper)
item.name: Holiday Tour of Elms & Marble House Mansions!
